feed.title: Dockerizalo Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dockerizalo: v1.1.0
entry.content:
v1.1.0

What's Changed

  • feat: add support for docker labels by @undernightcore in https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/pull/3

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/commits/1.1.0

How to update

Stop Dockerizalo

shell docker compose down

Pull new images

shell docker compose pull

Start Dockerizalo again

shell docker compose up -d

entry.title: New release for Dockerizalo: v1.2.0
entry.content:
v1.2.0

What's Changed

  • feat: replace dockerode build with docker cli and add app path configuracion by @undernightcore in https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/pull/4

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undernightcore/dockerizalo/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

How to update

Stop Dockerizalo

shell docker compose down

Pull new images

shell docker compose pull

Start Dockerizalo again

shell docker compose up -d

entry.title: New release for Dockerizalo: v1.3.0
entry.content:
v1.3.0

Hello everyone! üéâ

I am thrilled to introduce Docker image deployments and App templates in this release! These features bring us one step closer to full Docker Compose deployments.

‚ú® What's New?

üê≥ Image Deployments

You can now deploy single-container applications‚Äîlike databases, services, and more‚Äîdirectly from any registry!


üì¶ App Templates

Think of templates as pre-configured image deployments‚Äîthey automatically set up variables, networks, and volumes for you! üöÄ

Currently, we support PostgreSQL, and we welcome your contributions to expand our template library! (Icons from Selfhosted Icons‚Äîthank you!)

üîó Full Changelog: Compare v1.2.0 ‚Üí v1.3.0

How to update

Stop Dockerizalo

shell docker compose down

Pull new images

shell docker compose pull

Start Dockerizalo again

shell docker compose up -d
